@jreback I checked and ``GroupBy.apply`` doesn't support string func arguments with positional args or keywords so seems like nothing to test there in this PR, see https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b5d81cfe43eeccfc3641aa9578097f726da9ce9d/pandas/core/groupby/groupby.py#L676
